resources.string: Buying and selling books since 1990. We have an inventory of 50,000 books most of which his not offered online. We carry out-of-print, antiquarian, unusual and uncommon books, autographed books, documents, and signed photographs, early printed maps, ephemera and more. We are interested in acquiring personal libraries, family or institutional collections, or any number of books of quality. We have an open shop but it is OPEN BY APPOINTMENT only: 1757 N. Kimball, Chicago IL 60647. Please contact us prior to visiting. We are accessible from the 606 (www.the606.org) at the Spaulding access point. By bus take North
